name: 5th Edition of International Conference on Dentistry and Oral Health
content: Through our initiatives in education and research, American Dental Conference organized by Magnus Group for Dental and Oral Health is one of the prominent professional organizations dedicated to improving dental and oral health by supporting advanced science-based evidence. This year marks the “5th Edition of International Conference on Dentistry and Oral Health.” (American Dental 2022) which will be held during April 25-27, 2022 in a Virtual format. Oral and general health is linked, and oral health is a leading indication of overall health, happiness, and quality of life. Keeping this in mind our conference will be centered around the theme “SMILE: Shaping dentistry with Multifaceted Innovations and Leveraging Enhanced technologies”. This annual flagship event will showcase the latest research in the field of dentistry and oral health. Professionals from all leading universities, researchers, dentists, oral care experts, healthcare professionals, academicians, scientists and companies will be given a global platform to share their research experiences, published and unpublished research findings on all aspects of this rapidly expanding field.
